title: [BUG] Corki Q
body: Just played a 3v3 vayne game and was vsing a Corki which was using Dragon Wing Corki and every time his q like 85% of the time his q circle to show where it will hit wasn't showing which caused me to die as i didn't know where it was going to land and his q has a hard time seeing while it is in the animation as its like a firework. Rito please fix XD {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Are you sure you weren't being hit by something else and he was just using trinket?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Kylar Alice,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ETpkZUqE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-29T08:38:17.064+0000)
>
> Are you sure you weren't being hit by something else and he was just using trinket?

I'm very sure he was using his q you can even see his q go off like the animation just the red indicator circle was disappearing like 85% of the time.
